name: MessyMessi
description:
MessyMessi is an online multiplayer soccer experience for only the most hardcore serious gamers you can imagine. Inspired by the incredible world famous athlete Lionel Messi bathe in the glory of the most precise movement, nuanced artistry and professional soccer experience gaming has and will ever be able to offer. You're welcome world and more importantly, you're welcome Messi. 

Development Team

- Bilal Saqib

- Dani Cervera
